data.title: Salt Rimmers
images: https://demitris.com/cdn/shop/files/Demitris-Logo-Stacked-WHT_1.png?v=1713758559, Liquid error (sections/footer line 364): Width must be between 1 and 5760 2x
https://demitris.com/cdn/shop/files/Demitris-Logo-Stacked-WHT_1.png?v=1713758559, Liquid error (sections/footer line 512): Width must be between 1 and 5760 2x
data.meta_description: Demitri's Gourmet Bloody Mary and Margarita Mixes bring your party to life. Order yours today to make your favorite cocktails, dinner entrees, or party snacks.
data.text:
The perfect complement to the perfect Bloody Mary mixes! Add Demitri's very own custom blend of sea salts and spices from around the world to the rim of your glass for a delicious, aromatic accent for the most delicious Bloody Marys!

Original Rimshot! This blend of Hawaiian sea salts, smoked salts, pepper, celery seed and a few secrets let’s you hang on to the plain ol’ kosher salt for the Margaritas!

Bacon Rimshot! Demitri teamed up with his friends at J&D's, makers of Bacon Salt®, to bring you "Bacon Rimshot". A smoky, savory garnish that adds aroma and tons of flavor-great with a nice cold sip of a Bloody Mary!
